src.groovy.com.vaadin.grails.server
[Groovy] Interface UriMappingsHolder

interface UriMappingsHolder

Provides mappings between URIs such as /vaadin/book#!show/id=1 and Vaadin UIs or Views.

Authors:
Stephan Grundner
Since:
2.0
